parameters.name: directory_path
parameters.description: (string) The absolute path of a directory.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: An opaque page token which was the

200.description: An array of DirectoryEntry for the contents of the directory. If `next_page_token` is set, there may be more entries in the directory.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

409.description: Request was rejected due a conflict with an existing resource.

get.description: Returns the contents of a directory. If there is no directory at the specified path, the API returns a HTTP 404 error.
